# Change Log

- fix [#1](https://github.com/luqimin/tinyvm/issues/1)

## 0.7.0 | 2017.10.10
- minor bug fix

## 0.6.0 | 2017.09.16

## 0.5.0 | 2017.09.14
- add some snippets

## 0.3.0 | 2017.09.08
- add range format
- add some snippets

## 0.2.0 | 2017.09.08
- add file format (use [prettydiff](http://prettydiff.com/))
- next: add range format

## 0.1.0 | 2017.09.07
- add snippets 

## 0.0.1 | 2017.07.25
- add basic support for .vm
